definition: to return to one's home town
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)

sentences.english: Self-employed Behaviors of returning-home migrant workers is of great significance for the construction of new countryside.
sentences.chinese: 返鄉農民工創業對於新農村建設意義重大。

sentences.english: The third part is the education of children returning from chain scission problem.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要研究返鄉流動兒童的教育斷鏈問題。

sentences.english: She bought many duty-free items on the flight back home.
sentences.chinese: 她在返鄉的飛行中買了很多的免稅商品。

sentences.english: Most of the passengers are college students on their winter  vacation and  migrant workers returning home for Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 大多數乘客是放寒假的大學生和返鄉過年的農民工。

sentences.english: And many of the migrant workers now heading back to their hometowns for the Lunar New Year holiday that begins Jan. 25 will have no jobs to return to.
sentences.chinese: 而如今很多返鄉過年的農民工年後可能就沒有工作了。

sentences.english: We will arrange for those that have returned to their home villages to take part in the construction of local public facilities.
sentences.chinese: 組織返鄉農民工參與農村公共設施建設。

sentences.english: A trip to his home town triggered his childhood memory.
sentences.chinese: 返鄉之旅勾起了他的童年回憶。

sentences.english: However, a large number of ex-migrant workers returning to their homes won't necessarily translate into massive social unrest.
sentences.chinese: 但是大量農民工返鄉並不會造成大規模的社會動盪。

sentences.english: There are many homeward-bound rural laborers and students.
sentences.chinese: 趟火車上，有很多返鄉民工和學生。

sentences.english: Most of the passengers are college students on their winter vacation and migrant workers retuning home for Spring Festival.
sentences.chinese: 旅客多爲放寒假的大學生和返鄉過春節的農民工。

sentences.english: Expatriate South Sudanese are also coming home in droves after decades of civil war.
sentences.chinese: 流亡國外的南蘇丹人也正在大批返鄉。

sentences.english: Striking the veteran convened the parade for the opening veterans returning home visit.
sentences.chinese: 韻書召集當年的老兵遊行要求臺灣開放老兵返鄉探親。

sentences.english: It also includes return facilitation centers, mostly in Baghdad.
sentences.chinese: 這些措施裏還包括主要在巴格達設立促進返鄉中心。

sentences.english: They made a living in Shanghai during the slack seasons of farming and returned during the busy ones.
sentences.chinese: 他們多在農閒期奔赴上海謀生，又在農忙時返鄉務農。

definition: fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
to trade/to carry out commercial activities/in business
to go home to visit one's family
to go on a tour/to have an outing
to begin an undertaking/to start a major task/to initiate/to venture/venture/entrepreneurship
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
